task:
Task:
  The response explains or describes the subject for the stated audience.
constraints: Completeness ("full"): The response provides a thorough answer for normal use, covering all major aspects without needing every micro-detail.
Directional ("fly rog"): The response modifies the task to identify abstract patterns and general principles, then examines their structural relationships and reflect on their implications.

hydrated_constraints.description: The response provides a thorough answer for normal use, covering all major aspects without needing every micro-detail.
The response modifies the task to identify abstract patterns and general principles, then examines their structural relationships and reflect on their implications.
